title: Banana Oatmeal Pancakes
description: A healthy and delicious way to start your day with banana and oats.
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Heat a non-stick skillet and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden.

title: Avocado Toast with Tomato
description: Simple and flavorful avocado toast topped with fresh tomato slices.
instructions: Toast the bread until golden.
Mash avocado and season with salt and pepper.
Spread avocado on toast and top with tomato slices.

title: Quinoa Salad with Chickpeas
description: A light and nutritious quinoa salad loaded with chickpeas and veggies.
instructions: Mix quinoa, chickpeas, cucumber, and tomatoes in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, then toss to combine.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Creamy Tomato Soup
description: A comforting, gluten-free tomato soup perfect for any meal.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot and sauté onion until soft.
Add tomatoes and vegetable broth, bring to a boil.
Simmer for 10 minutes, then blend until smooth.
Stir in cream and serve hot.

title: Grilled Vegetable Wrap
description: A quick and healthy vegan wrap loaded with grilled vegetables.
instructions: Spread hummus over the tortilla wrap.
Layer grilled vegetables on top.
Roll tightly and cut in half.

title: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
description: A healthy and flavorful dinner option with baked salmon and asparagus.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place salmon and asparagus on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil, season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until salmon is cooked through.

title: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
description: A creamy and decadent dessert made with avocado and chocolate.
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Spoon into serving dishes and chill for 1 hour before serving.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Rice
description: A quick and healthy stir-fry served over rice.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok and stir-fry vegetables for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for 2 more minutes.
Serve over cooked rice.

title: Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Chewy and delicious gluten-free chocolate chip cookies.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl.
Stir in melted butter to form dough.
Scoop onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Vegan Mac and Cheese
description: A creamy and comforting vegan take on mac and cheese.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Blend soaked cashews, nutritional yeast, almond milk, and garlic powder until smooth.
Pour sauce over cooked pasta and stir to coat.
